oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "The Sons of Confederate Veterans" poem

oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Poetry; Veterans; Families; Sectionalism (United States)
May, John A.; United States - Civil War, 1861-1865 - Poetry - Confederate States
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Five-verse poem by John A. May entitled "The Sons of Confederate Veterans." At the end of the poem, it states that it was reprinted from "Tall Pines," a collection of poems by John A. May.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: May, John A.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Civil War Centennial Commission Records 1961-1965, RG 22
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Civil War; Centennial Commission was charged with planning, organizing, and documenting the U. S. Civil War Centennial through a campaign of public awareness, education, preservation, and restoration.
